description:
Jimbei reaches the heartbreaking conclusion in the story of Queen Otohime, Nami does something completely unexpected, and Hordy Jones makes a foreboding appearance!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Back to the Present! Hordy Makes a Move!
De retour dans le présent. Hody passe à l`action
Из прошлого в настоящее! Ходи начинает действовать!
再び現在へ! 動き出すホーディ
